Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'Sir, the Corrupted ahead have all been exterminated.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'This has been surprisingly easy so far... Quite unlike the reports from other defeated squads.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: "Look at those Corrupted by the roadside. They're just standing there before the graffiti. I don't think they even notice us...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'It is quite eerie, but other than that, nothing noteworthy.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Leader', 3: 'These graffiti are gathering the minds of these Corrupted.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'Gathering their minds? But the Corrupted has no consciousness to speak of, sir. They are only puppets moving through the whims of the virus.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Leader', 3: 'These graffiti are different from any other normal graffiti. There must be some special "meaning" behind it that is grouping these Corrupted together.', 4: '3'}

{2: 'Construct Leader', 3: 'And this "meaning" and their resonance have gone beyond the influence of the Punishing Virus. After all, it\'s been proved for a long time that Corrupted under the control of Punishing Virus will never be interested in erasing anything except humanity.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Leader', 3: 'This is possibly a... display of some sort of free will... I must report this immediately back to HQ—', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: "These graffiti cools down the area too much and will affect our passage, so... I'm just trying to clean the graffiti in front of us...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Leader', 3: 'This is too dangerous! Stop this at once...!', 4: '3'}
{3: 'The Corrupted that were studying the graffiti all swerve around to face the Construct squad.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: "W-what...? It's releasing... mist? Wait, our radar systems are all malfunctioning!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Humans... cannot appreciate... my work... too stupid...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Stupidity... forgivable... but destroying... my work...? Unforgivable...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: "Wait, what's that... a spray paint can?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'The mechanoid in the memory just now...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It should be the one behind these graffiti drawings.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Has it been hiding near us all this time? Why didn't we sense it?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "The replay just now mentioned their radar systems failing... The Construct parts and vital fluids... Is that how it's concealing itself?", 4: '3'}
{3: "An array of colors splatters onto Lee's jacket."}
{3: "As Lee tries to chase after the culprit, mist suddenly creeps out from that mysterious figure, enshrouding everyone's vision."}
